short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the Color Picker Extension: Capture, save, and organize captivating colors effortlessly from any webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple color picker for easy and fast usage. 

Our color picker tool offers a straightforward and user-friendly way to choose colors. With a simple click on the hex code, you can copy your selected color. Plus, if you decide to start over, you can easily delete all your picked colors by clicking the "Clear All" button. It's designed to simplify your color selection process and make it more convenient for your design needs.

Color formatting: HEX.
Copy by click.
